grades.comments: You did a very good job analyzing the themes in the book. Your insights into the character development were very thoughtful.
Your summary of the plot was clear, but I would have liked to see more analysis of the main character's motivations.
The report was well-organized and covered all key points, but be sure to focus more on the author's writing style next time.
I appreciate how you connected the book’s themes to real-world issues. It showed deep understanding.
Your conclusion was strong, but the body of your report could benefit from more detailed examples from the text.
You did well with your character analysis, but your report would be stronger with more specific quotes from the book.
Good job on summarizing the plot! Try to provide more of your personal opinion and reflection in future reports.
The report was concise and informative. It would have been even better with a bit more depth in your critique of the author’s choices.
You provided a clear overview of the book, but I would have liked to see more connection between the story and the themes you discussed.
Your writing was clear and easy to follow. In future reports, try to dive deeper into the symbolic meanings in the story.

assignments.name: Final Report - The Great Gatsby
assignments.description: The purpose of this book report is to help you summarize the key elements of the story, understand the author’s message, and reflect on your personal response to the book. You’ll be describing the plot, main characters, setting, and themes in a way that shows you’ve read and thought about the story in detail.

books.title: Animal Farm
books.author: George Orwell
books.description: British and irish fiction (fictional works by one author)
